snippet: An M.I.T. physicist’s video series gets other researchers to open up about their lives and passions.
abstract: MIT Media Lab physicist Cesar Hidalgo has begun hosting Cambridge Nights: Conversations About a Life in Science, an online series of video interviews with local scientists that allows them to share information about their lives, their work and their views of the world
lead_paragraph: An M.I.T. physicist’s video series gets other researchers to open up about their lives and passions.

headline.seo: M.I.T. Physicist Gives Scientists an Online Interview Outlet
headline.main: Scientist’s Online Interviews Draw His Peers Out of Lecture Mode
